name: Bow Hunter Safari
description:
Bow Hunter Safari is most addictive animals hunting simulation game. This action games ultraistic 3d graphics, easy controls and amazing animations makes your playing experience interesting and joyful. Hunting animals with archery is a fun. If you want to become legend archery hunter this game completes all your hunting dreams comes true.

Features:
- Realistic and beautiful jungle environment.
- Hunt stag's using Bow and Archer.
- Stunning third person game.
- Hunting furious and dangerous stags.
- Improve your skills to clear levels as it's tough to hunt them.
- Amazing riding and then archery experience.
- Unlimited arrows and time to hunt dangerous stag's.
